Extremely unique asymmetrical pvp game.  Unfortunately has a couple bugs but usually nothing gamebreaking.  Steep learning curve and takes a fair amount of time investment, but I'd recommend to anyone looking for a unique semi-competitive experience.

recommended!

Поначалу была классная игра в которую можно было играть сутками напролёт, но с каждым последующим обновлением багов становилось всё больше и больше. И вот сейчас игра по "багованности" достигла пика. Каждая вторая игра зависает на поиске и ничего не помогает кроме как вызвать "диспетчер задач" и завершить процесс, но и это не гарантия того, что игра не зависнет при следующем запуске на поиске лобби. Это проблема давно известна, достаточно я поиске вбить: "зависает дбд на поиске игры" и вы увидите, что корни проблемы тянутся аж с 2017 года. Игра развивается, но кроме дополнительного платного контента ничего не добавляют - движок не улучшают, а баги копятся. ИГРАТЬ НЕВОЗМОЖНО!! Одна игра в час, если повезёт.

When my friend recommended this game to me, I did not like it. I do not like horror games, but then I got it during the winter sale to try it out, and it is actually fun. The more you play the game, the less scary it gets. The gameplay is very fun, especially if you play with friends. I recommend this game, and even if you do not like horror games, just stick with it and it will soon not be like a horror game at all anymore.

You can play both as a survivor and as a killer. Both are very fun, but as you move up the ranks as killer, it gets very hard because you will be matched up with people who are 10 ranks better than you almost every match, and you will not be able to rank up most of your matches. 
I think that they need to buff the killer in some ways because eventually it gets too hard to continue playing. However, playing as a survivor is way different. You can rank up most of your matches, and sometimes you will be matched up with a beginner killer when you are around purple ranks, and that is just too easy. 

I absolutely recommend the game, but I recommend that you play with friends. If you are going to play killer, prepare to get outplayed once you have moved up the ranks. At first, it will be easy, but then you will be stuck and it will not be fun anymore. 
Still, it's a very good game. 9/10

(Edit) Hitboxes are absolute garbage, so be prepared to get hit through windows/pallets/walls quite often as survivor, and to sometimes miss clear hits as killer. 
Not only that, but sometimes, pallets can't be dropped at all, and Dead Hard can't be activated no matter when or how many times you press the correct button.
Matchmaking also keeps getting worse with every update, and they keep nerfing killers that don't need it and buffing survivors that don't need it.

(Edit again) With almost every update they keep nerfing killers and making them harder to play. At the same time, this game has by far the worst matchmaking system I have ever seen and experienced. No matter which killer rank you have, nearly every match will be played against a group of four friends at the highest ranks. In its current state, this game sucks unless you play survivor with a couple of friends, so the only way I can recommend this game is if you have one or more friends to play survivor with, and stay away from playing killer. It is sad to see a game I used to love become this unbalanced and bad overall. I cannot rate this game higher than 5 / 10 anymore.
